title: Standert Triebwerk CR ignores trends, builds beautiful classic steel road bikes
content:
While the world builds more aero carbon disc brake road bikes, Berlin’s Standert Triebwerk CR eschews trends to refine a classic and classy steel road bike. Lightweight butted Columbus steel tubing, 1 1/8″ external bearing headset, rim brakes… that doesn’t sound like the latest technology, but it does sound like the kind of timeless bike […]
